comments.html: Not directly. EBGP session loss does not count as a BGP route flap. The BGP flap dampening would only kick in in the downstream routers.

comments.html: cyclical BGP session behavior is for one simple reason - if you are working after hours (usually at night) and you screw something you don't need to call upstream technician every time you change something.
